name: Pyramid Solitaire Zone
description:
Pyramid Solitaire is a timeless card game that requires strategy and fine logic to finish the round game.
To win, all cards from the pyramid must be moved to the foundation until the last one!

The object of the game is to remove pairs of cards that add up to the total of the highest card in the deck from a pyramid arrangement of 52 cards.

Unlimited rounds to play!
Experience points to win next levels more easily !
hearts to win lives!

Enjoy playing this new game of Pyramid Solitaire..!
